text: 8.6 Mal 2.10, Jon 1.3, Apo 17.28, Lom 11.36, 1 Ko 12.6, Epe 4.5-6, Plp 2.11 Tap agnepal kuŋay okok mɨdebal ak pen, God chɨn ak nokom yɨbɨl mɨdeb. Ne Bapi chɨn tap okok mɨdupsek gɨlek mɨdeb. Ne mɨdaknɨŋ chɨn mɨdobun. Pen Bɨawl abe nokom yɨbɨl mɨdeb, Jisas Klays nɨm. God gek Klays ne tap okok mɨdupsek gɨlak. Pel anɨgek chɨn koŋɨm mɨdobun.
